scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -d "themes/next" ]; then git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next && cp _next_config_backup.yml themes/next/_config.yml; fi
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "backup at `date`" && git push -u origin backup
scripts.deploy: npm run backup && npm run push && hexo d --g
